attributes.action: We should not be returning to school 2021 if we are in tier 4.
attributes.additional_details: Because the government control the tiers and when schools are open, therefore they would have to handle this petition.
attributes.background: To close schools in the beginning of 2021 until cases have dropped and areas have moved down tier(s). As we should not be leaving our house in tier 4.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564209
